title: Sales Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Python Software Foundation (Austin, TX) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions:
Sales Presentation via zoom ...creating visual power point presentation, presented in writing before interview...scenario challenge format, examines sales skills, ability to think on your feet, and services and product knowledge
Team q & A
Three steps
Interactive
Situational
Interview Questions: Situational...explain why we should hire python to train our non technical staff?
